result.name: planning-casework-database
result.notes: Data related to the processing of planning applications and appeals that have been called-in and recovered for decision by the Secretary of State.  The data is extracted from Planning Inspectorate forms and Inspector’s Reports.

organization.name: department-for-communities-and-local-government
organization.title: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
organization.description:
The Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government's (formerly the Department for Communities and Local Government) job is to create great places to live and work, and to give more power to local people to shape what happens in their area.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-housing-communities-and-local-government

result.title: Planning casework database

extras.value:
Much of this data is already available through the 
Planning Portal (www.planningportal.gov.uk) or through the gov.uk website. Release of the full data would be dependant on establishing an appropriate way of removing personal information whilst retaining data integrity.
